title: Time Out: Interruption Interrupted
post:
This is stale news and it seems Professor Christopher has changed his mind and is now more willing to defend the 1988 CD results. Yet that does not change the picture as he would certainly entertain proposals for fresh carbon dating, but as he told me, it would have to be definitive and differences in opinion would have to be sorted out first to avoid more and more papers about why this second test may also have gone wrong. Needless to say, if it doesn’t indicate the first century AD.
Surely it doesn’t make a difference to him since he is a practicing Christian, perhaps a lesson for those with weak faith.
author: Louis
